about_the_game:
[DISCONTINUED]

This was a two player online pvp version of mine sweeper. Where the objective was to locate the mines rather than avoid them. 

I've discontinued development on the game and cleared the store page; however! The game is still downloadable and playable.
detailed_description:
[DISCONTINUED]

This was a two player online pvp version of mine sweeper. Where the objective was to locate the mines rather than avoid them. 

I've discontinued development on the game and cleared the store page; however! The game is still downloadable and playable.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: X64, M1 ARM
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Both Intel 64bit and M1 ARM are supported. x86 is not supported.

name: Discontinued

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Core i5,
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
